headline: Republic Services (NYSE:RSG) Reports Q1 Sales and Income Growth with US$4 Billion Revenue
summary: Republic Services (NYSE:RSG) showcased strong financial performance in its first quarter of 2025, with sales rising to $4,009 million and net income increasing to $495 million. These results, alongside a quarterly dividend affirmation and expansion efforts such as the inauguration of a new Polymer Center, may have bolstered the company's share price by 14% over the last quarter. While the market showed a mix of trends due to tariff uncertainties, Republic Services' developments provided an...

headline: Republic posts strong start to year amid ambiguity around credits, tariffs
summary: The company posted strong financials in the first quarter of the year. Executives said their sustainability projects and underlying business were on solid financial footing in Q1 despite macroeconomic uncertainty.
